import turtle

wn = turtle.Screen()
wn.bgcolor('white')

t = turtle.Turtle()
t.penup()
t.goto(-100,0)
t.pendown()

for c in ['red', 'green', 'yellow', 'blue']:
    t.color(c)
    t.forward(75)
    t.left(90)
